Events in 3 Months:
+ [7eme Rencontres R](https://r2018-rennes.sciencesconf.org/) **July 5 & 6**
Rennes - Agrocampus
+ [useR! 2018](https://user2018.r-project.org/) **July 10**
The annual useR! conference is the main meeting of the international R user and developer community.
+ [LatinR 2018](http://latin-r.com/) **Sept 4-5**
Buenos Aires, Argentina.
[This week's local R-User and applied stats events (week of 2018-06-04)](https://community.rstudio.com/t/upcoming-r-community-events-week-of-2018-06-04/9079)
More past events at [R conferences & meetups](https://conf.rweekly.org).
